div.p: E.D.B. lab was supported by ‘Investissement d’Avenir’ grants (CEBA, ref. ANR-10-LABX-0025; TULIP, ref. ANR-10-LABX-41). Computations were performed on EDB-Calc Cluster which uses a software developed by the Rocks(r) Cluster Group (San Diego Supercomputer Center, University of California, San Diego and its contributors), hosted by the laboratory “Evolution et Diversité Biologique” (EDB). We thank P. Solbès for support. We are grateful to Kate Wootton for correcting the English text.
